feedData.title: Bitcoin Price Dips Again: BTC Bears Tighten Grip
feedData.subTitle:
Bitcoin price failed to climb above the $66,500 resistance. BTC is again moving lower and might decline below the $64,600 support zone.

Bitcoin started a fresh decline from the $66,500 resistance level.

The price is trading below $65,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average.

There was a break below a connecting bullish trend line with support at $65,250 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair (data feed from Kraken).

The pair could extend losses if there is a clear move below the $64,600 and $64,200 support levels.

Bitcoin Price Faces Rejection

Bitcoin price started a recovery wave above the $65,000 level. BTC climbed above the $65,500 and $66,200 levels. However, the bears were active near the $66,500 zone. A high was formed at $66,444 and the price started another decline.

There was a move below the $65,500 and $65,400 support levels. The price dipped below the 50% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $64,050 swing low to the $66,444 high. Besides, there was a break below a connecting bullish trend line with support at $65,250 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair

The price tested the $64,600 support zone and the 76.4% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $64,050 swing low to the $66,444 high.

Bitcoin is now trading below $65,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average. If there is another upward move, the price might face resistance near the $65,250 level. The first major resistance could be $65,500. The next key resistance could be $66,000.

Source: BTCUSD on TradingView.com

A clear move above the $66,000 resistance might start a steady increase and send the price higher. In the stated case, the price could rise and test the $66,500 resistance. Any more gains might send BTC toward the $67,500 resistance in the near term.

More Downsides In BTC?

If Bitcoin fails to climb above the $65,250 resistance zone, it could continue to move down. Immediate support on the downside is near the $64,600 level.

The first major support is $64,200. The next support is now forming near $64,000. Any more losses might send the price toward the $63,200 support zone in the near term.

Technical indicators:

Hourly MACD – The MACD is now gaining pace in the bearish zone.

Hourly RSI (Relative Strength Index) – The RSI for BTC/USD is now below the 50 level.

Major Support Levels – $64,600, followed by $64,000.

Major Resistance Levels – $65,250, and $66,500.

Source: NewsBTC.com

The post Bitcoin Price Dips Again: BTC Bears Tighten Grip appeared first on Crypto Breaking News.

feedData.title: Bitcoin Price Stagnates Amid Market Uncertainty: What Traders Need to Know
feedData.subTitle:
Bitcoin, the world’s most popular crypto currency, has experienced a period of stagnation, with its price oscillating between $56,552 and $73,777. This range-bound behavior, influenced primarily by the cash-and-carry arbitrage strategy, has created a highly volatile trading environment, leaving traders grappling with the challenge of predicting breakout directions.

Understanding the Cash-and-Carry Strategy

The cash-and-carry arbitrage strategy is a market-neutral approach that involves purchasing Bitcoin in the spot market (going long) and simultaneously selling its futures contract (going short) when trading at a premium.&middot

For the full story, head over to TheCurrencyAnalytics.com.

feedData.title: Top 6 Cryptos for the Next Bull Run: BlockDAG, Bitcoin, BNB, XRP, Solana and Toncoin
feedData.subTitle:
As the crypto market braces for the next bull run, investors are on the lookout for the most promising cryptocurrencies that could deliver substantial returns. Among the many contenders, a few stand out for their innovative technology, market position, and growth potential. 

This list highlights the top cryptocurrencies to watch, with a particular emphasis on BlockDAG, a project that is making significant strides in the blockchain space.

1. BlockDAG (BDAG): The Frontier of Blockchain Innovation

BlockDAG recently delivered a groundbreaking keynote from the Moon, announcing its expected mainnet debut slated for mid-August. This presentation showcased their advanced Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) technology, ensuring high transaction speeds and secure confirmations via a Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus mechanism. This approach enhances both security and scalability, making BlockDAG a formidable contender in the crypto space.

BlockDAG’s rapid transaction speeds and low fees make it an ideal choice for microtransactions. Users can handle small transactions without incurring high costs, which is crucial for innovative business models and interactions in decentralized applications. This technology is particularly beneficial for in-game economies, tipping systems, and content monetization, where minimal fees are essential. 

Furthermore, BlockDAG facilitates seamless machine-to-machine payments, bolstering the Internet of Things (IoT) ecosystem. Its efficiency in processing microtransactions establishes BlockDAG as a leader in small-scale transaction and payment solutions.

The presale has seen remarkable success, amassing $3.3 million in just 12 hours and potentially on track to reach $5 million daily. So far, BlockDAG has raised $52.3 million, issued over 11.6 billion BDAG coins, and earned $3.3 million from sales of 8,006 miners. BlockDAG remains an attractive investment opportunity for those seeking to leverage its innovative technology and expansive growth potential.

2. Bitcoin (BTC): The King of Cryptocurrencies

Bitcoin remains the most dominant and well-known cryptocurrency. Its limited supply and widespread adoption make it a staple in any crypto portfolio. As the market prepares for the next bull run, Bitcoin’s historical performance and market influence position it as a top choice for investors seeking stability and potential gains. With increasing institutional interest and growing acceptance as a store of value, Bitcoin continues to lead the charge in the crypto world.

3. BNB (Binance Coin): The Utility Powerhouse

BNB, the native token of the Binance exchange, has consistently shown strong performance. As one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world, Binance’s influence significantly boosts BNB’s value. BNB is used for various purposes within the Binance ecosystem, including transaction fee discounts, staking, and participating in token sales on Binance Launchpad. Its extensive utility and the growth of the Binance ecosystem make BNB a promising candidate for the next bull run.

4. XRP: The Cross-Border Payment Solution

XRP, developed by Ripple Labs, focuses on enabling fast and low-cost cross-border payments. Despite facing regulatory challenges, XRP has maintained a strong position in the market. Its ability to facilitate quick and affordable international transactions makes it a valuable asset, especially as global demand for efficient payment solutions increases. If Ripple can navigate its regulatory issues successfully, XRP is poised for significant growth in the upcoming bull run.

5. Solana (SOL): The High-Speed Blockchain

Solana has gained attention for its high-speed and low-cost blockchain platform. With the capability to process thousands of transactions per second, Solana is designed to support decentralized applications (dApps) and crypto projects requiring scalability. Its efficient performance and growing ecosystem of projects and developers make Solana a strong contender for the next bull run. Investors looking for a blockchain with robust technical capabilities and a vibrant developer community should consider SOL.

6. Toncoin (TON): The Telegram Connection

Toncoin, initially developed by the Telegram team, aims to bring blockchain technology to the masses. Despite Telegram’s withdrawal from the project due to regulatory pressures, the TON community has continued its development. Toncoin focuses on providing fast and secure transactions, leveraging the reach and influence of the Telegram network. With its strong community support and technical foundations, Toncoin could see significant appreciation in the next market uptrend.

Boosting BlockDAG for the Next Bull Run

As we look forward to the next bull run, BlockDAG stands out with its innovative use of DAG technology, ensuring high transaction speeds and low fees. Its potential for microtransactions, IoT integration, and robust presale performance make it a standout investment. 

While Bitcoin, BNB, XRP, Solana, and Toncoin also offer promising opportunities, BlockDAG’s unique approach and recent advancements position it as a leader in the crypto space. Investors should keep a close eye on these top cryptos as they prepare for the next wave of market growth.

feedData.title: From Bitcoin to Dogecoin: Here Are the Top Cryptos Making Holders Rich
feedData.subTitle:
A prominent source of analytical insights in the cryptocurrency market, IntoTheBlock, recently published an exciting new report giving an insight into the level of profitability among holders of different cryptos.

Topping this list is Bitcoin, the largest crypto by market cap, with 89.11% of its stakes in profit. This large number not only shows that Bitcoin is still going strong, but that interest in the cryptocurrency among investors remains intact.

Ethereum remains behind, but far behind again as 83.19% of those that own it are showing profits, indicative of the strength and future prospects of this particular altcoin leader. With the prospect of an Ethereum ETF launch on the horizon, it has been predicted that this could lead easily to more positive growth for Ethereum in the market.

The report also identified “memecoins”, which demonstrated a particularly high percentage of their holders in the money, with Pepe and Dogecoin leading the space.

This chart highlights top cryptocurrency projects ranked by the percentage of holders in profit.👇🟢Bitcoin remains dominant, with over 86% of its holders in profit.🟡Ethereum is close behind, showing strong performance. The introduction of an #EthereumETF could be the push… pic.twitter.com/MOtJumk9uU

— IntoTheBlock (@intotheblock) June 20, 2024

Memecoins and Large-Caps: A Comparative Analysis

According to IntoTheBlock, only a minority of Bitcoin and Ethereum holders have realized gains, but everyone would still be in the black if they held these very large-cap cryptocurrencies all along; Popular-meme coin communities are clearly unique areas. 

Though they are largely uncharacteristic and bullish in most cases, pure memecoins such as Pepe (80.57% of holders profitable) and Dogecoin (74.99%) still manipulate investor interest and engagement enormously.

Some of this data suggests these two segments – large-caps and memecoins – today account for the lion’s share of profitable crypto holdings. This could indicate that traditional heavyweight tokens still provide stability and growth, but that new volatile tokens also offer much higher returns albeit with greater risks.

As shown in the accompanying infographic from IntoTheBlock, this analysis is an important metric for investors looking to get a feel of market sentiment and potential investment opportunities. Insight into which cryptocurrencies are experiencing a high level of recent profitable HODLers, investors and traders can weigh the potential upside against their own risk limits.

feedData.title: Cryptocurrency Widely Used To Support Drug Trafficking In Mexico, Says FinCEN
feedData.subTitle:
According to Foresight News, the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) of the US Treasury Department recently stated that cryptocurrencies are being widely used to support drug trafficking activities in Mexico, including the illegal trafficking of fentanyl. The cryptocurrencies involved include Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, and USDT. FinCEN has warned American financial companies to be aware of the criminal networks producing these dangerous narcotics.

Cryptocurrencies, due to their anonymous nature, have become a preferred mode of transaction for illegal activities. The US Treasury Department is urging financial institutions to be vigilant and monitor any suspicious activities related to these cryptocurrencies. The use of digital currencies in illegal activities poses a significant challenge to law enforcement agencies worldwide.

The warning from FinCEN comes as part of a broader effort to combat drug trafficking and other illegal activities funded through cryptocurrencies. The agency is working closely with other law enforcement agencies to track and disrupt these criminal networks. The fight against the misuse of cryptocurrencies in illegal activities is a top priority for the US Treasury Department.

feedData.title: Bitcoin Turns Illinois Developer Into Crypto Tycoon; Can BlockDAG Repeat the Magic With Its $52.3...
feedData.subTitle:
Achievement stories often begin with individuals who spot opportunities early. Such is the tale of a software developer from Illinois who discovered Bitcoin mining in 2013 and built his own rig. His early adoption and technical expertise turned him into a crypto tycoon.

Today, BlockDAG (BDAG) offers the same or even greater potential. With user-friendly mining solutions and ongoing presale, BlockDAG holds the potential to replicate the remarkable success seen with Bitcoin. BlockDAG’s presale has already crossed $52.3 million with projections of 30,000x ROI.  

 Bitcoin Mining: The Success Story

In 2013, a software developer from Illinois stumbled upon a forum discussing Bitcoin mining. Intrigued by the concept of decentralized digital currency, he decided to build his own mining rig. This decision marked the beginning of a journey that would transform his financial future. Back then, Bitcoin was still in its nascent stage, and mining was accessible to individuals with technical expertise and a willingness to experiment.

As Bitcoin’s value began to rise, the Illinois developer’s early adoption paid off handsomely. His technical skills and forward-thinking approach allowed him to accumulate a significant amount of Bitcoin, which eventually appreciated to unprecedented levels. This success story isn’t just about Bitcoin; it’s a testament to the potential of early adoption and the rewards that come with being ahead of the curve in the cryptocurrency world.

 Achieving Crypto Dreams With BlockDAG 

BlockDAG is asserting itself as a strong contender in the cryptocurrency space, challenging conventional blockchain architecture with its visionary approach. By integrating the robust security of traditional blockchains with the flexibility of Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAG), BlockDAG effectively tackles the blockchain trilemma security, scalability, and decentralization.

This innovative strategy positions BlockDAG as a compelling option for investors and enthusiasts looking to capitalize on the next major opportunity in the crypto market.

 BlockDAG’s User-Friendly Mining Solutions

The BlockDAG X1 mobile mining application, the beta version of which is available on both the App Store and Google Play, is a game-changer in the world of crypto mining. The app allows users to mine up to 20 BDAG coins daily from their smartphones. By simply clicking a lightning button every 24 hours, users can boost their mining rate, creating a passive income stream without draining their mobile’s battery.

For those looking to scale up their mining operations, the BlockDAG X10 miner offers a compact and efficient solution. This device, roughly the size of a Wi-Fi extender, can mine up to 200 BDAG coins daily. Its plug-and-play setup makes it easy for anyone to start mining at home. With energy-efficient operation and minimal noise output, the X10 is perfect for home-based miners.

The BlockDAG X30 miner takes mining to the next level with a formidable hash rate of 280 GH/s. This device can mine up to 600 BDAG coins daily while maintaining energy efficiency. Its compact design and advanced ASIC technology make it ideal for users seeking high-performance mining equipment without the complexity.

For professional miners, the BlockDAG X100 miner is the ultimate mining device. With a staggering hash rate of 2 TH/s, this device can mine up to 2,000 BDAG coins daily. Its advanced features, including enhanced heat dissipation and robust connectivity options, make it a powerful addition to any mining operation.

BlockDAG’s innovative mining rigs have sparked significant investor interest, propelling its presale figures to unprecedented heights. Each presale batch has witnessed substantial price increases, with the current Batch 18 reaching $0.0122, marking an astounding 1120% growth since Batch 1. BlockDAG anticipates further exponential growth, potentially offering up to 30,000x ROI. Moreover, BlockDAG has raised $52.3 million from the sale of 11.7 billion BDAG coins and $3.4 million from over 7800 miners.

Seize the Opportunity to Become A Millionaire 

The story of the software developer from Illinois serves as a powerful reminder of the opportunities that early adoption and technical expertise can bring. His journey highlights the transformative potential of cryptocurrencies as he experienced in Bitcoin.

Similarly, BlockDAG, with its advanced technology and user-friendly mining solutions, offers a unique opportunity for investors to capitalize on the next wave of crypto innovation. For those looking to invest in the future of digital finance, BlockDAG presents a compelling opportunity to achieve remarkable financial success.

feedData.title: 3 Reasons Bitcoiners Should Also Buy Ethereum, According to Bitwise
feedData.subTitle:
With spot Ethereum ETFs on the horizon in the United States, should existing Bitcoin ETF holders split their crypto holdings into ETH?

In a Twitter thread on Thursday, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan offered three reasons for why this might be a good idea.

Why Bitcoin Holders Should Buy Ethereum

The first, Hougan wrote, is for the sake of diversification. Since predicting the future of crypto is difficult, holding a stake in both leading assets can provide investors relief in case one asset falls out of favor, or gobbles up the other over time.

“Ask any investor from the dot-com boom who bought AOL Pets.com,” Hougan said. “They got the overall bet right—the internet is going to be big!—but the specifics wrong. Sad!”

As of writing, Bitcoin’s market cap accounts for 55% of the entire crypto market, according to TradingView. Ethereum comprises 18.6%.

While ETH has performed generally flat against Bitcoin over the last five years, its dominance against the top crypto has slowly receded since the September 2022 merge. Still, the ETH/BTC ratio received a modest boost when approved to receive a U.S. spot ETF last month.

Secondly, Hougan said the fundamentally different nature of Bitcoin and Ethereum makes it difficult to choose between them. While Bitcoin is optimized towards being “better money,” Ethereum is designed for “programmable money” that enables blockchain applications like stablecoins and DeFi.

“Adding some ETH to a majority BTC position gives you broader exposure to all the things public blockchains can do,” he said.

BTC And ETH Perform Best Together

Lastly, Hougan said the historical performance of both assets shows that they work best when balanced together in a portfolio.

For example, a “traditional” 60/40 portfolio with a 5% crypto allocation had a higher cumulative return over the past four years when weighted 70/30 between BTC and ETH allocations (56.32%) than when allocated purely to BTC (54.49%).

Interestingly, it even had a lower “maximum drawdown” than the BTC-only portfolio over that time, only pulling back 25.19% at its peak compared to 25.35%.

Nevertheless, Hougan said there is still a chief reason investors may want to stay BTC only.

“It’s very likely that Bitcoin is the dominant new form of “money” that emerges in crypto,” said Hougan, citing its massive existing lead and community orientation towards this market.

“Money is a massive market. There’s plenty of space for BTC to run if it succeeds,” he said.

The post 3 Reasons Bitcoiners Should Also Buy Ethereum, According To Bitwise appeared first on CryptoPotato.

feedData.content:
Here are Some Risk Management Tips For You👇

1. Be aware of transaction fees on different exchanges, as they can impact your profitability. 
2. Choose exchanges with competitive fee structures for your trading volume and frequency. 
3. Factor in withdrawal fees when calculating your potential returns. 
4. Use limit orders instead of market orders to avoid higher fees. 
5. Consider the impact of network congestion on transaction fees, especially for cryptocurrencies with high transaction costs. 
6. Plan your trades to minimize the frequency of transactions, thereby reducing cumulative fees.

He struck a deal with his parents: if he could become a millionaire by the age of 18, he wouldn’t have to return to school. Remarkably, John's gamble paid off. By the time he was 18, his initial investment had skyrocketed to over $2 million. His journey didn't stop there; by 15, John had already made such an impression that he was invited to give a TED Talk, sharing his inspiring story with the world. John's incredible success highlights the power of taking risks and believing in oneself, turning a childhood investment into a life-changing fortune. His story is a testament to the potential of Bitcoin and the impact of youthful entrepreneurship.

feedData.title: MicroStrategy's Ongoing Bitcoin Acquisition
feedData.subTitle: MicroStrategy, a major holder of Bitcoin, has completed a convertible notes offering to purchase more BTC. The company announced the completion of a 2.25% convertible senior notes offering, raising $800 million, with $100 million from an option to purchase. The net proceeds of approximately $786 million will be used to acquire additional Bitcoin and for general corporate purposes. MicroStrategy recently bought 11,931 BTC for $786 million, bringing their total holdings to 226,331 BTC. Despite significant Bitcoin investments, the company reported losses in 2024. MicroStrategy's founder, Michael Saylor, has been actively involved in Bitcoin acquisitions since 2020. The company's strategy of using Bitcoin as its primary reserve currency has led to substantial BTC purchases over time. While MicroStrategy continues to invest in Bitcoin, their financial reports show ongoing losses, highlighting the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. feedData.content:
🚨 YOU COULD LOSE EVERYTHING! 🚨

Unless You Understand the Psychology of the Crypto Market

Experts predict a new bull run peaking in late 2025, 12-18 months after the April 2024 halving. Ready to ride the wave? Many won’t make it. Let's break down the psychological phases:

📌 PHASE 1 - Accumulation: 

During this phase, crypto Whales and OGs buy at discounted rates. New projects emerge amid lingering skepticism. Think back to last year when $BTC was at $15,000 and the market was in turmoil.

📌 PHASE 2 - Momentum:

We’re here now. Prices climb, excitement builds, HODLers rejoice, FOMO kicks in, and altcoins surge.

📌 PHASE 3 - Euphoria/Excess:

Greed takes over, prices soar daily, mainstream attention grows, and scams emerge. When the Bitcoin Fear and Greed Index hits 90, manage your positions. Be smart or you won’t see the crash coming.

📌 PHASE 4 - Massive Crash/Long Red Candles:

 Prices plummet, panic selling ensues, media turns negative, Whales and new investors exit, and veterans buy the dip. Noobs are left holding bags for years. DON'T BE THAT PERSON!

⏰ Tips for Success:

- Invest wisely and patiently.
- Use dollar-cost averaging.
- Take profits on the way up.
- Diversify to avoid overexposure.
- Be cautious of hype and scams.
- Watch for market sentiment changes.
- Hedge positions strategically.
- Keep cash reserves for opportunities.

The coming months are filled with excitement, risks, and rewards. Navigate wisely to achieve life-changing wealth in this crypto revolution!

feedData.title: Bitcoin(BTC) Drops Below 65,000 USDT with a Narrowed 0.06% Increase in 24 Hours
feedData.subTitle: On Jun 20, 2024, 22:40 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Bitcoin has dropped below 65,000 USDT and is now trading at 64,999.230469 USDT, with a narrowed narrowed 0.06% increase in 24 hours.

translatedData.content:
📊 #Bitcoin  Volatility Declines in Long Term, Is It Ready to Become a Currency?

🔶 One of the main arguments put forward by detractors of Bitcoin is its high volatility, claiming that it is not a currency. Indeed, Bitcoin is known for its significant price fluctuations, being able to lose or gain 5% of its value in a day and up to 80% in a few months.  

🔶 Such uncertainty regarding variations in the value of #BTC  in the short term would prevent its users from relying on this currency to make their daily purchases. However, unlike its capitalization, Bitcoin's volatility has decreased significantly over time.  

🔶 According to a study by #Kaiko  Research, although the price of Bitcoin increased from $17,000 at the start of 2023 to more than $73,000 in March 2024, an increase of 330%, its volatility 60-day average has never been lower over such a long period.  

🔶 As an indication, the 2 main periods of high volatility of BTC were caused by the Covid-19 crisis in 2020 and by the fall of the Terra ecosystem, followed by the bankruptcy of #FTX  in 2022. We could therefore think that volatility increases mainly when the price is in a sharp decline, while its volatility had also reached a peak of 106% during its 2021 high at $69,000.  

🔶 Kaiko Research nevertheless points out that it is too early to consider this trend definitive. Indeed, it is impossible to determine whether Bitcoin will repeat its volatility spikes in the future. However, these figures show that BTC has gained maturity, which proves its investors right and still leaves it with the possibility of becoming an everyday currency.

feedData.content:
📊 La volatilité de #Bitcoin   diminue à long terme, est-il prêt à devenir une monnaie ?

🔶 L'un des principaux arguments avancés par les détracteurs du Bitcoin est sa forte volatilité affirmant qu'il ne s'agit pas d'une monnaie. En effet, le Bitcoin est connu pour ses fluctuations de prix importantes, pouvant perdre ou gagner 5 % de sa valeur en une journée et jusqu'à 80 % en quelques mois.  

🔶 Une telle incertitude concernant les variations de la valeur du #BTC   à court terme empêcherait ses utilisateurs de se fier à cette monnaie pour effectuer leurs achats quotidiens. Cependant, contrairement à sa capitalisation, la volatilité du Bitcoin a considérablement diminué au fil du temps.  

🔶 D'après une étude de #Kaiko   Research, bien que le cours du Bitcoin soit passé de 17 000 dollars au début de l'année 2023 à plus de 73 000 dollars au mois de mars 2024, soit une augmentation de 330 %, sa volatilité moyenne sur 60 jours n'a jamais été aussi basse sur une période aussi longue.  

🔶 À titre indicatif, les 2 principales périodes de forte volatilité du BTC ont été causées par la crise du Covid-19 en 2020 et par la chute de l'écosystème Terra, suivie de la faillite de #FTX   en 2022. On pourrait ainsi penser que la volatilité augmente principalement lorsque le cours est en forte baisse, alors que sa volatilité avait également atteint un pic de 106 % lors de son sommet de 2021 à 69 000 dollars.  

🔶 Kaiko Research rappelle néanmoins qu'il est trop tôt pour considérer cette tendance comme définitive. En effet, il est impossible de déterminer si le Bitcoin répétera ses pics de volatilité à l'avenir. Cependant, ces chiffres montrent que le BTC a gagné en maturité, ce qui donne raison à ses investisseurs et lui laisse toujours la possibilité de devenir une monnaie du quotidien.
